caption: (Translated by Google) Super special  (Original) Super especial
(Translated by Google) Very good food made daily and with excellent flavor whoever tries it repeats  (Original) Muy buena comida hecha a diario y con excelente sabor el que la pruebe repite

A hidden little cafetería in Downtown Hialeah, I decided to grab a bite for breakfast while waiting in line for my daughter's passport application turn at the post office down the block. The cafetería is located inside the bodega, and there's also a typical Cuban style take out window. I went in and was immediately greeted by the main clerk and then the owner. They don't have menus, but I wasn't surprised since this is pretty much a mom and pop operation. I asked for the typical Cuban breakfast, which was scrambled eggs with ham & Munster cheese, and they added tomatoes, peppers, and onions for me, a tostada, and a café con leche. Everything was absolutely fresh and delicious! The kitchen is spotless; they have a typical sandwich stand with the plexiglass front, so I could see everything going on in the kitchen. On the way out, the owner invited me back, politely letting me know what they were serving for lunch.  Price was a bargain! Service was friendly, and the food was delicious. I'm definitely going back!
